requests.description: A household of 4 residing in a public rental flat in Yishun requires assistance with a wheelchair for their 79-year-old grandmother. The elderly grandmother has significant mobility challenges, being physically weak and unable to move around independently. Her previous wheelchair has broken down, but the family cannot afford a replacement due to financial constraints. A wheelchair would significantly improve the grandmother's quality of life by aiding her mobility, enhancing her safety, and allowing her to spend time outside.
